metadata.name: Witchs' Wedding
metadata.description:
A warm summer night.  
A fae procession.  
A different set of vows, but matrimony all the same.  
---Witchs' Wedding---


Endless Experiment is the work of musician Known Fact. This collection serves as a living album, a journal from which the fruits of experimentation in genre, composition, and production find home. When a spark of inspiration hits or a set of works don't form an album of their own, the lab that is the Endless Experiment welcomes in the vagabond tracks.
